formatName: Acrobat PDF/E - Portable Document Format for Engineering PDF/E-1
formatDescription: PDF/E-1 is a subtype of PDF based on PDF 1.6 and meant for engineering and technical documentation. It was made available by Adobe in 2008 under the international standard ISO 24517-1:2008. It supports interactive media, animation and 3D engineering models, and allows mark-up.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 04/2024 (v.118): Description and links added as part of PRONOM Research Week 2023. Submitted by Archives nationales (French National Archives).

internalSignatures.name: PDF/E-1
internalSignatures.note:
BOF: %PDF-1.[0-7] - specification is based on PDF1.6, however the specification doesn't specifically preclude other versions. We have seen and produced samples with PDF value not 1.6, so we are including all possible values.
VAR: <pdfe:ISO_PDFEVersion>PDF/E-1</pdfe:ISO_PDFEVersion>
